page.title: 05Recreation on the Chase.
page.content: There are lots of narrow paths and wider tracks across the hills and valleys of our survey block. These are ideal for walkers or those on horseback, and they are also used for practice by joggers and runners. There are many public rights of way through the forest, and easy to follow way-marked trails cross both heath and forest areas. The Chase is popular too for orienteering events. Many people just sit by their cars and enjoy the views. Many take a picnic to enjoy in the fresh air.
